title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description:
Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)

When two projects are created, P1 and P2, and P2 is selected and closed, the option to open/close projects is inconsistently unavailable in the Navigator.
OB: The option to open/close projects is not always available in the Navigator after closing a selected project.
EB: The option to open/close projects should always be available in the Navigator after closing a selected project.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2 in the Navigator.
3. Close project P2.
4. Verify if the option to open/close projects is available in the Navigator.
